byline: Kai Ryssdal, Daisy Palacios, Stan Alcorn, Steve Gardner, Tracey Samuelson, Amy Scott, Edmund Morris and Scott Tong
title: Marketplace for Monday, May 4, 2015
teaser: Airing on Monday, May 4, 2015: When executives run for office, their record in business can be a double-edged sword. They can cite their experience in executive decision making, but there are also plenty of bad business decisions that will get picked over. As former Hewlett-Packard CEO Carly Fiorina formally enters the 2016 race, we look at the political peril that comes with a business record. Plus: McDonald's plans on revamping the company by increasing the number of restaurants it franchises and buying back more shares.
